arStrings.szText: {c_label}Lucky Hit:{/c} Damaging an enemy has up to a {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"|%|]{/c} chance to form an exploding {c_important}Ice Spike{/c}, dealing {c_random}[(Owner.Weapon_Damage_Min_Total + Owner.Weapon_Damage_Delta_Total) * Affix_Value_1]{/c} Cold damage.  Triple this chance if the enemy is {c_important}{u}Frozen{/u}{/c}.
